Janik-Malmor.name: Janik Malmor
description: Baron Janik Malmor is the baron of Frenkel. The baron is a vassal of Count Jeskin Sebroski and is charged with protecting the western border of Navolin from external threats. The baron's personal manor is Auburn Castle.

Many families live and work in the barony of Frenkel, including the Montajays, a halfling family of which Filibert Montajay was a member. Filibert was a subject of the baron until he was forced to leave the fortress in Sirngor of 2C 2573.

Archduke-Nicolai-Valken.name: Archduke Nicolai Valken
description: Archduke Nicolai Valken is the current ruler of the Archduchy of Zurast.

Jeskin-Sebroski.name: Jeskin Sebroski
description: As the Count of Szary, Jeskin Sebroski is both the local lord, administrator, and commander of a feudal county bordering the state of Tovanis. The count takes his role as the ruler of a border province very seriously, knowing that he is the first line of defense against incursions from foreign states, and monstrous creatures from beyond his borders.
A man of noble birth, Count Sebroski was tutored from a young age in the arts of riding, warfare, court life and hunting.

As a member of the nobility of the Kingdom of Navolin, Jeskin was brought into the ranks of the Hussars and excelled during the dangerous training regime that all initiates must undergo. He has since risen through the ranks to become one of the commanding officers of the order.

He is a common sight in the court of King Kzesimir III in Frecyra where he is called up on to provide military advice. He is also a close personal friend of Prince Aronas Czak and returned from a provincial issue in the village of Rythlon upon learning the news of the prince's death.

King-Kzesimir-III-of-House-Czak.name: King Kzesimir III of House Czak
description: King Kzesimir III is the monarch of Navolin and head of the noble Czak House. His court is held in Frecyra at the Palace of the Western Wind.

Nantar-Izorin-Sarentus.name: Nantar Izorin Sarentus
description: @+Izorin Sarentus+@ is the Nantar, or @*Woodland King*@ in Elvish, of the peoples of the Ildroun Vale.

Elrîs-Melhira-Sarentus.name: Elrîs Melhira Sarentus
description: @+Melhira Sarentus+@ is the Elrîs, or @*Queen of the Stars*@ in Elvish, of the peoples of the Ildroun Vale.  She is the queen-consort of Nantar Izorin Sarentus.

Ernil-Thabos.name: Ernil Thabos
description: @+Thabos+@ is an Ernil, or @*Prince*@ in Elvish, of the peoples of the Ildroun Vale. He is the Lord General of the armies of the Ildroun Vale and the younger brother of Nantar Izorin Sarentus. Nicknamed @*Thabos the Warrior*@, he is among the greatest living warriors in the Vale. A master horseman, swordsman and archer, he is the defacto heir to the throne.

Prince-Ardashir.name: Prince Ardashir
description: Prince Ardashir men Shahreen was a human prince of the Kingdom of Abassyr. He spent his youth in the capital of Khezrabad before being set to Frecyra as an ambassador of his family and kingdom. While in Frecyra, his advisor and bodyguard was the elf wizard Telarion Elentiir.

High-Queen-Inga-Villdyr.name: High Queen Inga Villdyr
High-Queen-Inga-Villdyr.occupation: High Queen of the Clans of Lemuria
description: @+High Queen Inga Villdyr+@ is the leader of the Realm of Lemuria and the head of Clan Villdyr. She was became the head of @;Clan Villdyr;@ at the age of twenty two, and was elected to the position of High Queen by the Clan Council of Lemuria when she was twenty nine.

Han-Darga-Vazrak.name: Han Darga Vazrak
Han-Darga-Vazrak.occupation: Dagra of Clan Godak, Han Dagra of Cibrin
description: @+Han Darga Vazrak+@ is the leader of the Realm of Cibrin, the head of Clan Godak, and is said to be one of the greatest living warriors on Centhris.

Torild-Sjomann.name: Torild Sjomann
description: @+Clan Chief Torild Sjomann+@ is the leader of Clan Sjomann and one of the ruling members of the Clan Council of Lemuria.

Wuldren-Tordenfødt.name: Wuldren Tordenfødt
description: @+Clan Chief Wuldren Tordenfødt+@ is the leader of Clan Tordenfødt and one of the ruling members of the Clan Council of Lemuria.

Viljar-Bjørsel.name: Viljar Bjørsel
description: @+Clan Chief Viljar Bjørsel+@ is the leader of Clan Bjørsel and one of the ruling members of the Clan Council of Lemuria.
